page.title: 08A DAY AT THE TOURIST OFFICE
page.content: Checked weather at Field Centre. Postcard arrives from American cyclists. They had accepted my advice to stay in Ballater and not try the 1:5 hill to Tomintoul in a heavy rain storm. Braemar office phoned: is there a post bus to Glen Muick? Letter in to book for Braemar Games, where to get them in now? Most places in Braemar, Ballater full,it will have to be Dinnet, Aboyne or Tarland! Busy but manage coffee, then out to bank for change.Lot of people eating ice-cream so the weather must be better at last. Dutch couple in. No cash for boat home. Can they phone Holland? Back later to phone again- having found money. Phone call about caravan for July-impossible all booked. Couple in for B&B-double or twin? Almost closing time- can I book room in Inverness? Managed Aviemore instead.
